meanings.definition: A substance that helps the body adapt to stress.
meanings.sent1: An adaptogen can assist the body in handling stress effectively.
meanings.sent2: I take an adaptogen supplement to help me manage stress better.
meanings.sent3: The adaptogen whispered to the body, 'Don't worry, I've got your back!'
meanings.sent4: Like a shield, the adaptogen protected the body from the arrows of stress.
meanings.sent5: Picture the adaptogen as a superhero swooping in to save the day from stress villains.

meanings.definition: A natural remedy that increases the body's resistance to stress.
meanings.sent1: This adaptogen is a natural way to boost your stress resistance.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on adaptogens to enhance their ability to handle stress.
meanings.sent3: The adaptogen joked, 'I'm the stress-fighting potion in disguise!'
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an adaptogen, strengthening everyone's resilience to stress.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of stress, the adaptogen bloomed as a powerful shield against worries.

meanings.definition: An herb or plant that aids in the body's ability to cope with stress.
meanings.sent1: The adaptogen herb supports the body in managing stress levels.
meanings.sent2: I brew adaptogen tea to help me relax during stressful times.
meanings.sent3: The adaptogen plant winked at the body, saying, 'I'll help you chill out!'
meanings.sent4: The adaptogen acted as a soothing balm for the body's stress-ridden soul.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the adaptogen as a gentle guardian guiding the body through turbulent stress waters.
